trust.title: Don't leave your safety in just anyone's hands
trust.description: Security is one of the most important aspects of efficient business operations. Starting from this premise, Emamut provides complete security solutions covering multiple vulnerable areas. All of these pursue a single objective: ensuring the protection of people, facilities and assets.

items.question: Can anyone install a security system?
items.answer: No. Security systems can only be installed by specialized companies, based on a license issued by the General Inspectorate of the Romanian Police, with prior approval from the Romanian Intelligence Service.

items.question: Alarm system or video surveillance system?
items.answer: Each system has its advantages and disadvantages. Video surveillance records events, while alarm systems warn and alert in case of unauthorized entry. The two systems complement each other.

items.question: I want to start a business. Is an alarm system enough?
items.answer: For a business, we recommend a combination of video surveillance and alarm systems. This provides both real-time monitoring and immediate alerting in case of an incident.

items.question: Do I need police approval for installed systems?
items.answer: Yes, depending on the type and size of the installed system. You will receive the installation project, user instructions, system warranty, invoice and installer code.

items.question: Is it important to maintain security systems?
items.answer: Yes. To benefit fully from system protection, it is recommended and sometimes mandatory to have them maintained and periodically checked by qualified personnel.

items.question: An event was captured by our surveillance system. Am I obligated to hand over these recordings to those involved?
items.answer: No. System beneficiaries are obligated to provide to judicial authorities, at their written request, video recordings that capture the commission of criminal offenses.

items.question: Can any type of equipment be used in security systems?
items.answer: No. Equipment used must be approved and certified according to current legislation. We only use equipment from recognized manufacturers.

about.title: ABOUT US
about.intro: WE ARE THE SECURITY EXPERTS FOR 15 YEARS.
about.description1: Emamut is a private business founded in 2010. Our main activity consists of installing and maintaining security systems (alarm systems, video surveillance and access systems). Additionally, we install structured cabling (data, voice and sound networks), wireless data networks (Wi-Fi), as well as intercom and video intercom systems (for houses, apartments and apartment buildings) and fire detection and signaling systems.
about.description2: Each project is analyzed separately by our specialists. We offer each client the most suitable solution, taking into account the location's characteristics, the beneficiary's requests and the available budget. To ensure optimal operation of installed systems, we offer maintenance and service both during and after the warranty period.
about.description3: Through our professionalism and reliability, we earn our clients' trust and provide high quality services at affordable prices.
about.stats: We are proud that in the last 15 years, over 500 clients have chosen us.
